>
[Shapespeak Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2353)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _shapespeak mask_ is carved into the shape of an animal, usually tailored to a species of beast that the user favors. While wearing this mask, you can speak when [polymorphed](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) into an animal. The mask removes no other limitations, such as the inability to cast spells while transformed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
